description: This Dart file defines a theming class 'AppTheme' for a Flutter application, providing color schemes, typography styles, and theme data for light and dark modes tailored to a vintage Bookshop Revival UI.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class encapsulating theme data, including color schemes, typography, and preconfigured ThemeData objects for both light and dark themes tailored to the vintage aesthetic of the Bookshop Revival UI.

methods.name: _colorScheme
methods.description: Generates a Flutter ColorScheme based on the provided Brightness, defining color mappings for light and dark modes.

methods.name: _typography
methods.description: Creates a TextTheme with customized text styles, using serif fallback fonts and specific styling attributes.
